train_cartpole.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 """Training script for the CartPoleInterface for testing.
3 License:
4  BSD 3-Clause License
5  Copyright (c) 2023, Autonomous Robotics Club of Purdue (Purdue ARC)
6  All rights reserved.
7 """
8 
9 from rktl_autonomy import CartpoleInterface
10 from stable_baselines3 import PPO
11 import gym, time
12 
13 def show_progress(model, episodes=5):
14  env = gym.make("CartPole-v0")
15  obs = env.reset()
16  episodes = 0
17  while episodes < 5:
18  action, __ = model.predict(obs, deterministic=True)
19  obs, __, done, __ = env.step(action)
20  env.render()
21  time.sleep(0.01)
22  if done:
23  obs = env.reset()
24  episodes += 1
25  env.close()
26 
27 env = CartpoleInterface()
28 model = PPO("MlpPolicy", env, verbose=1)
29 
30 print("showing untrained performance")
31 show_progress(model)
32 
33 print("training on 10k steps")
34 model.learn(total_timesteps=10000)
35 
36 print("showing trained performance")
37 show_progress(model)
